inputFormat: The first and the only line contains the sequence of characters $ s_{1}s_{2}...\ s_{n} $ $ (1<=n<=10^{6}) $ — the saved string. It is guaranteed that the given string contains only small English letters, digits and characters '.', '\_', '@'.
outputFormat: Print in a single line the number of substrings that are valid e-mail addresses.
hint:
In the first test case all the substrings that are correct e-mail addresses begin from one of the letters of the word agapov and end in one of the letters of the word com.

In the second test case note that the e-mail x@x.x is considered twice in the answer. Note that in this example the e-mail entries overlap inside the string.
translation:
定义「电子邮箱」为形如 $\text{A@B.C}$ 的字符串，其中：

- $\text{A,B,C}$ 都非空；
- $\text A$ 仅由小写字母、数字和下划线构成且开头必须由小写字母引导；
- $\text B$ 仅由小写字母和数字构成；
- $\text C$ 仅由小写字母构成。

给定一个仅由小写字母、数字、下划线、`@` 和 `.` 构成的字符串 $|S|$，求其为「电子邮箱」的子串总数。（$|S| \le 10 ^ 6$）
